about_text:
I'm Amit Malka, 29 years old, I hold a bachelor's degree in biotechnology-Bio Data and have experience in both laboratory settings and data analysis.
I've worked in MyHeritage's COVID-19 lab, focusing on RNA extraction and team management. This role honed my problem-solving skills and commitment to excellence.

During my degree, I completed a single-cell RNA sequencing data analysis project using R, which significantly enhanced my data analysis skills.

I recently completed an intensive AI Development program at Ben-Gurion University (110-hour program, June-September 2025), gaining hands-on expertise in large language models, intelligent agent development, and RAG systems. This specialized training equipped me to architect sophisticated AI solutions that transform business challenges into opportunities through cutting-edge technologies and implementation strategies.

My technical skills include:
projects_intro: Explore my portfolio showcasing advanced data analysis projects that demonstrate my expertise in transforming complex data into meaningful insights.
project_rna_brief: End-to-end data pipeline for single-cell RNA sequencing analysis with machine learning methodologies.
project_rna_content:
Architected and implemented comprehensive data pipeline for single-cell RNA sequencing analysis at MIGAL Research Institute. Leveraged R programming to build scalable computational workflows for processing high-dimensional genomic data.

Key achievements:
â€¢ Engineered custom algorithms for data normalization, dimensionality reduction, and cluster analysis
â€¢ Developed automated QA protocols ensuring data integrity throughout analytical process
â€¢ Created comprehensive documentation and modular code structure for future research
â€¢ Visualized complex multidimensional datasets to extract actionable biological insights
â€¢ Applied machine learning methodologies demonstrating core principles now essential in AI development

View Project on GitHub
cv_no_pdf: Your browser does not support PDF viewing. Click here to download the file
intro_desc:
Curious AI developer with strong foundation in programming and statistical analysis.
Advanced expertise in LLM Models and AI agent development, building intelligent systems that transform complex data into actionable insights.
slider_umap: Classification of cells into clusters using UMAP, each point represents a gene expression profile of a cell. Color sorting was based on gene expression similarity.
slider_marker: Pf4 is a genetic marker for immune system cells (encoded for a cytokine in blood platelets).
slider_identity: Based on genetic markers I discovered the cell types in each cluster.
slider_volcano: Volcano plot shows that lactone treatment reduces the effect of hypertension on gene expression in endothelial cells.
project_cve_brief: Interactive dashboard analyzing Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures trends (1999-2020).
project_cve_content:
An end-to-end analytics project delivering comprehensive insights into cybersecurity vulnerability trends using predictive analytics and automated insight generation. The dashboard combines advanced data processing with interactive visualization to transform raw CVE data into actionable intelligence, demonstrating principles fundamental to AI-driven business intelligence.

Key Features:
â€¢ Dynamic filtering by year range and severity levels
â€¢ Real-time KPI tracking (Total CVEs, Avg CVSS Score, Patch Response Time)
â€¢ Predictive trend analysis with statistical correlations and forecasting
â€¢ Automated pattern recognition in access vector distributions
â€¢ Top 10 CWE (Common Weakness Enumeration) categories with risk scoring
â€¢ Intelligent alerting system for anomaly detection

Technologies Used:
â€¢ Splunk for data processing and SPL queries (similar to modern data pipelines)
â€¢ Power BI for interactive dashboard creation with embedded analytics
â€¢ DAX for advanced calculations and predictive modeling
â€¢ Statistical analysis and machine learning principles (Pearson correlation, RÂ² analytics)
project_financial_rag_brief: AI-powered hybrid RAG system for SEC 10Q financial document analysis with vector + graph retrieval.
project_financial_rag_content:
Architected metadata-driven hybrid RAG agent for SEC 10Q financial document analysis with vector + graph retrieval. Engineered multi-modal pipeline processing text, tables, and charts using LlamaIndex and advanced parsing.

Key Features:
â€¢ Dual architecture integrating ChromaDB vector store with Neo4j graph database
â€¢ Interactive Gradio interface with configurable controls
â€¢ Multi-modal document processing (text, tables, charts)
â€¢ Fully modular system with comprehensive testing suite
â€¢ Enterprise-level scalability and reliability

Technologies:
â€¢ Python & LlamaIndex - RAG framework
â€¢ ChromaDB - Vector database
â€¢ Neo4j - Graph database
â€¢ Gradio - Interactive UI
â€¢ Advanced document parsing and processing

about_summary:
I combine strong analytical expertise with advanced AI development skills to create intelligent systems that transform complex data into actionable insights. My background in biotechnology provides unique perspective on data-driven problem-solving, while my technical proficiency enables me to build scalable AI solutions.

I'm particularly interested in roles that leverage AI technologies to solve complex business challenges, where I can apply my expertise in LLMs, RAG systems, and intelligent agent development to create impactful solutions.
project_rna_content_intro: As a pioneer at the MIGAL Research Institute, I developed a comprehensive computational pipeline for single-cell RNA sequencing analysis applying machine learning methodologies. This groundbreaking project established a foundation for future researchers while demonstrating core principles now essential in AI development.
project_rna_bullet1: Rigorous data quality control and preprocessing (foundational for ML pipeline development)
project_rna_bullet2: Advanced dimensionality reduction techniques (similar to embedding spaces in LLMs)
project_rna_bullet3: Sophisticated cell clustering and identification (unsupervised learning applications)
project_rna_bullet4: Complex statistical analysis and pattern recognition (core AI/ML methodology)
project_rna_bullet5: Development of intuitive data visualizations and interpretability frameworks
ai_journey_intro: My transition from data analysis to AI development through structured learning and hands-on experience.
timeline_desc_1: Built strong foundation in statistical analysis, programming, and computational biology through biotechnology degree and research projects.
timeline_desc_2: Completed intensive 110-hour AI Development program at Ben-Gurion University, specializing in LLMs, RAG systems, and intelligent agents. Developed FINANCIAL RAG SYSTEM - hybrid AI solution for SEC 10Q financial document analysis.
timeline_desc_3: Actively seeking opportunities to apply AI expertise in innovative projects, building intelligent systems that transform complex data into actionable insights.
course_link: Learn more about The Institute AI
project_medical_rag_brief: Proof of Concept for a Medical Question-Answering RAG system using FAISS and Ollama.
project_medical_rag_content: This project demonstrates a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system for medical queries, utilizing FAISS for vector search and Ollama for local LLM inference.
